meanings.definition: A payment that is not made in installments.
meanings.sent1: She paid for the car in one noninstallment.
meanings.sent2: The furniture store offered a noninstallment option for the sofa purchase.
meanings.sent3: The noninstallment for the laptop was a relief for her budget.
meanings.sent4: His noninstallment of the rent was a burden on his finances.
meanings.sent5: The noninstallment of the loan made her feel financially secure.

meanings.definition: Not involving or consisting of installments.
meanings.sent1: The noninstallment plan simplified the payment process.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the noninstallment method for buying appliances.
meanings.sent3: The noninstallment approach saved them time and paperwork.
meanings.sent4: His noninstallment strategy was efficient and cost-effective.
meanings.sent5: The noninstallment policy made budgeting easier for the customers.
